DOC.brief_summary: Asthenopia eye strain describes nonspecific symptom eye tire intensive work . Vaccinium uliginosum flowering plant genus Vaccinium . This plant native cool temperature region Northern Hemisphere . Considering antioxidative ingredient , extract Vaccinium uliginosum expect play significant role treat various ocular pathology . The investigator perform randomize , case-controlled study healthy subject investigate protective effect Vaccinium uliginosum extract ( DA-9301 ) tablet computer-induced asthenopia .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect DA9301 Tablet Computer-Induced Asthenopia
DOC.criteria: 1 . Healthy subject age 20 65 year 2 hour daily use smart phone computer include tablet television 1 . Ocular disease either eye Ocular surface disease Best correct visual acuity < 20/30 Intraocular pressure > 21 mmHg Optical coherence tomography proven retinal nerve fiber defect Significant cataract ( lens opacity classification system III ) Significant entropion ectropion Significant tear drainage problem prove fluorescein dye dilution test 2 . Soft Hard contact lens use 3 day week 3 . History oral intake health supplement design improve asthenopia within 4 week participate study 4 . Pregnant woman 5 . Systemic disease Uncontrolled hypertension ( systolic /diastolic blood pressure > 140/90mmHg ) Uncontrolled diabetes mellitus ( fast blood glucose level > 180mg/dL ) Rheumatoid arthritis Malignant disease Active hepatitis ( type B C ) Acute chronic infectious disease Renal disease
